document.docAuthor: Bakker, Piet A. J. & Albano, Paolo G.
document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

bibRefCitation.author: Powell, A. W. B.
bibRefCitation.refString: Powell, A. W. B. (1940) The marine Mollusca of the Aupourian Province, New Zealand. Transactions and Proceedings of the Royal Society of New Zealand, 70, 205 - 248.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
New Zealand , Between Spirits Bay and Three Kings Islands in 50 fathoms deep (
91 m
)
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Triphoris ( Cosmotriphora ) dupliniana Olsson, 1916
—
Olsson & Harbison 1953: 295
, pl. 43, fig. 2.

Cosmotriphora dupliniana ( Olsson, 1916 )
—
Rosenberg et al. 2009: 645
.

Cheirodonta dupliniana ( Olsson, 1916 )
—
Fernandes & Pimenta 2019a: 12
, fig. 5–6.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
United States , North Carolina , Natural Well
.

Type material.
PRI 1376, lectotype . PRI 11016 , paralectotype
.

Remarks. Lectotype designation by Fernandes & Pimenta (2020) . The record of Olsson & Harbison (1953) from Florida is an incorrect identification and should be
Marshallora spec.
( Fernandes & Pimenta 2020 ). Daccarett & Bossio (2011) reported this species as
Triphora spec. 1
( Fernandes & Pimenta 2020 ).
Triphora ( Cosmotriphora ) bolax Olsson & Harbison, 1953
and
Cheirodonta mizifio M.R. Fernandes & Pimenta, 2015
are considered junior synonyms of
Triphoris dupliniana Olsson, 1916
by Fernandes & Pimenta (2020) .
